remarks: Isomorphism B is isomorphism A extended with an extra dimension set to the zero vector component i.e. the zero endormorphism.  Its domain is lattice elements less than or equal to the fiducial co-atom ` w ` . (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.)

$d f k w x $.
